rows.label: tev020301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev020301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Alice about the attack on Earth.

rows.label: tev020301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev020301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Alice if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev020301_SEL1011
rows.name:
Ask Alice for her thoughts
on the people living in NLA.

rows.label: tev020301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Alice about recent developments.

rows.label: tev020301_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Alice about recent developments.

rows.label: tev020301_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Alice about recent developments.

rows.label: tev020301_MSG0001
rows.name:
We had a radio in the evacuation shelter that let us
hear daily reports about various countries and cities
being destroyed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG0002
rows.name: It was...terrifying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then one day, xenoforms appeared in the city where
Eliza and I lived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG0004
rows.name:
It was over before we even knew it was happening.
They came in and reduced the entire city to ash.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG0005
rows.name:
I always thought that extraterrestrials would be our
friends, you know? Bring peace and medicine and
science and things like that. Not...kill everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG0010
rows.name:
I have a lot of respect for Eliza.
I wish that everyone would go hear her speak.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG0011
rows.name:
But no one seems interested in listening to her.
I guess everyone's too preoccupied with survival
to care about such things.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG0012
rows.name:
If you ever have the chance, however,
you should talk with Eliza yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG0013
rows.name:
I know you'd be super moved by what she has to say.
She's so kind, and so smart![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG1001
rows.name:
I wonder if there are lots of other people like Alex?
You knowâ€”ones who can't accept the decisions BLADE
HQ has made?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG1002
rows.name:
If those sorts of people were to go on a rampage in
New LA, our giant defensive walls wouldn't be worth
diddily-poo![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG1003
rows.name: No... I'm not going to think like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG1004
rows.name: Eliza says I can't just go around distrusting everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG1005
rows.name:
She says I should believe in my fellow humans
and be optimistic about our future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG1010
rows.name: Eliza's thinking about having a big public speech soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG1011
rows.name:
Even though it's been a while since the xenoforms came
to New LA, there are still loads of people who hold
prejudices towards them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG1012
rows.name:
She hopes that her speech can convince everyone
to finally get along with each other.
...I wonder if that's really possible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG1013
rows.name: Well, if anyone can do it, Eliza can![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG1014
rows.name:
I know that everyone will be moved by her words
and change the way they think. I just know it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG2001
rows.name:
Eliza's starting to get used to her replacement
mimeosome, and should be able to leave the
maintenance center soon. I'm so relieved![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG2002
rows.name:
Listen, I'm going to find out who it was that arranged
the attack on Eliza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG2003
rows.name:
When I do, will you find the bastard and help
apprehend them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG2004
rows.name:
We don't have the power to do things like that
ourselves. We need your help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG3001
rows.name:
According to Cheche, Alex was in league with those
weirdos from the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG3002
rows.name:
What do you think they were hoping to accomplish
by deceiving humans like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG3003
rows.name: It scares me just thinking about it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG3004
rows.name:
We all have to learn to trust each other so they can't
drive such wedges between us ever again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020301_MSG3005
rows.name:
And I'm going to do everything I can to help Eliza
make that dream a reality![ST:wait ]
